reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app declares the collection of data.
reply.reference: We comply with the Children’s Privacy Protection Act of 1998 (“COPPA”), a United States federal law. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. We do not publish apps or own services that target children as their primary audience. Some of our apps or services may be considered mixed audience services under COPPA, meaning that they may be directed at children under the age of 13, but children are not the primary audience. For these apps and services, we employ methods to ensure that we do not collect any personal information from users under the age of 13. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects personal data such as Account Name, Internal ID, Number and content of in-app purchases, Country where the Game was downloaded, Type of terminal used, Model number, Operating system of the terminal, Language settings of the terminal, Date of the download, App version, Days since the download, Duration of use of the Game, Number of times the Game has been accessed as well as aggregate statistical information including Android ID, Device type, Version of the operating system of the terminal, Facebook ID, and Audio settings.

content: Number and content of in-app purchases
Country where the Game was downloaded
Days since the download ("Age of the account")
Duration of use of the Game
Number of times the Game has been accessed
Version of the operating system of the terminal

reply.analysis: The privacy policy details the various personal data and aggregate statistical information collected by the app for use such as account management, bug detection, and app optimization. The data includes a wide range of personal identifiers and usage information.
reply.reference: The following categories of personal data may be processed for this purpose: Account Name, Internal ID, Number and content of in-app purchases, Country where the Game was downloaded, Type of terminal used (iPhone, iPad, etc.), Model number, Operating system of the terminal, Language settings of the terminal, Date of the download, App version, Days since the download (“Age of the account”), Duration of use of the Game, Number of times the Game has been accessed. Aggregate statistical information categories may include: Android ID, Device type, Version of the operating system of the terminal, Language settings of the terminal, Facebook ID, Audio settings. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy

d. Running the Game
The use of our Games requires data processing, without which the Game cannot be run. Said instances of data processing are in particular necessary in order for the Game to first at all be made available and ready to play, to detect and fix any bugs, to access scores, or also to link in-app purchases with the player’s account.
The following categories of personal data may be processed for this purpose:
Account Name
Internal ID

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that personal data is processed for specific purposes related to the support requests, advertising, and running the game.
reply.reference: The following categories of personal data may be processed for this purpose: Email address, User name, Content of your request, Operating system and version, Device type, Stored User ID, Cash used for in-game purchases, IP address, Place of registration, Location. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy, The personal data is processed for the purposes of advertising until such time as you revoke your consent. Should the personal data not be required for any further purposes, it will be erased. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy, The use of our Games requires data processing, without which the Game cannot be run. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Users, including parents and guardians of children, can request to review, modify, delete, or stop further collection of personal information by contacting the provided email privacy@synapticlabs.uk or using the contact information in the Privacy Policy. Data can be deleted upon request.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users, parents, and guardians have the option to request the deletion or modification of personal data.
reply.reference: parents and guardians may contact us to request to review, modify, delete, or stop further collection of their child’s personal information. This can be done by emailing us at: privacy@synapticlabs.uk or using other contact information provided in the Contact Us section of this Privacy Policy. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may transfer information collected about users, including Personal Information, to affiliates, subsidiaries, or other third parties across borders. This indicates that data sharing with third parties is enabled.
reply.reference: We may, in the process of providing Services to you, transfer information that we collect about you, including Personal Information, to affiliates and subsidiaries, or to other third parties across borders and from your country or jurisdiction to other countries or jurisdictions around the world. If you are located in the European Union or other regions with laws governing data collection and use that may differ from Canadian or U.S law, please note that you are transferring information and permitting the transfer of information, including Personal Information, to a country and jurisdiction that does not have the same data protection laws as your jurisdiction, and you consent to the transfer of information to the U.S. and/or Canada and the use and disclosure of information about you, including Personal Information, as described in this Privacy Policy. URL: https://www.synapticlabs.uk/privacypolicy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with Zendesk, Inc.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the third party, Zendesk, Inc., that the app shares data with.
